title: "Supports are irrelevant"
body:
I don't get why people say this.
Who nets ADC kills?
Who is in charge of vision?
Who can save you?
Who heals you?
Who shields you?
Who stuns for you?
Who peels for you?

"triggered support intensifies"

replies.body:
I mean, I carry most of my games as a support main. After about level 6, I can make a good decision about what I'm going to get out of my carry. If he's not so hot, I might have to nick a CS or two... He'll never know >.> 

Real talk: I think this is one problem the devs have done a pretty good job at fixing. Supports used to be much less relevant. Now they can be terrifying in good hands, and have more agency in a game. That being said, bot lane is now a bit crazy. 

I wonder if Riot will make good on their promise and take some power out of Marksman so we see the balance return to normal.

> [{quoted}](name=Digitalpoketmon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4mNLnY0F,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-04-20T22:47:28.216+0000)
>
> I don&#039;t get why people say this.
> Who nets **the team** kills?
> Who is in charge of vision?
> Who can save you?
> Who heals you?
> Who shields you?
> Who stuns for you?
> Who peels for you?
> 
> &quot;triggered support intensifies&quoteam

Ftfy

you would be amazed by some idiots
